text: The Estevan Bruins are a junior ice hockey team playing in the Saskatchewan Junior Hockey League (SJHL). Work to get a team for Estevan began in 1956 and resulted in the Humboldt-Melfort Indians moving to Estevan for the 1957â€“58 season. ==References== ==Other websites== * Estevan Bruins official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Saskatchewan Category:1950s establishments in Canada
title: Estevan Bruins
